description:
Another Masterpiece from the creators of PicsPlay Pro! 
Moldiv™ lets you combine and edit multiple photos to make amazing collages. Moldiv has fantastic frames and lots of professional editing options. Especially Moldiv offers awesome photo effects and great decoration features like text captions and numerous stamps. 

"Quick photo collages for your smartphone" - Washington Post
"Superpopular photo collage app" - VentureBeat
"Moldiv is a no-frills editor that lets you create collages quickly" - TUAW
"It’s possible to make thousands of different combinations of collage, ensuring that every single creation feels unique." - 148Apps

* Video Review : http://youtu.be/SEG-WEC9FjU
* New & Noteworthy selected by Apple in over 110+ countries - May 3, 2013 
* Featured as Great Free Apps in App Store - May 3, 2013 
* Spotlighted by App Store official Facebook page - May 6, 2013 
* Ranked No.1 Photo & Video in 72 countries – May, 2013
: US, UK, China, Japan, Korea, Russia, Brazil, Spain, Italy etc.

FRAME, COLLAGE & STITCH
- Frame, Free Collage or Stitch your photos
- Select one from 80 basic frames & 100 more premium frames
- Frame shuffle that recommends the perfect frame 
- Resize each frame area for unlimited customization 
- Move individual joints and change the shape of premium frames 
- Combine up to 9 photos in a single frame 
- Select multiple photos at once 
- Freely adjust frame aspect ratio from 1:2 to 2:1 

MAGAZINE
- Collage your photos like a magazine, a poster, or a themed album
- 60 Magazine presets for the most stylish photo editing

ADJUST
- Apply one of 50 photo effects to individual photos
- Control opacity of photo effects
- Apply the same effects to multiple images, all at the same time 
- Specially crafted filters that enhances the natural vibrancy in each photo 
- Zoom, pan, rotate or mirror each photo 
- Straighten each photo for perfect balance 
- Easily switch photos to different areas 

STYLE
- Rounded corners on photos 
- Change the border width 
- Add a shadow to the photos 
- 41 color picker and 80 patterns for the frame background 
- Select any of your photos to use as the frame background 

TEXT & STAMP 
- Add multiple texts with labels to anywhere on the frame 
- 250+ Fonts, 99 Colors & Patterns, Color Palette, 14 Styles, 34 Labels 
- Add 200+ Stamps and Speech bubbles 

SAVE & SHARE 
- Export to maximum resolution of your device 
- Photo Sharing to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Kakaotalk, Line etc. 

* Don’t forget to Tag #Moldiv when posting on Instagram. You may find your photos featured on the official Moldiv App!

Have a question or suggestion? We are waiting for your feedback! 
Facebook : facebook.com/MoldivPro
Instagram : @MoldivApp
Twitter : @JellyBus
releaseNotes:
Introducing Moldiv for iOS 8
We brought the full capabilities of Moldiv to Apple’s native Photos app. Please enjoy the newly added Photo Editing Extension and other cool features.

New iOS 8 Features
- Photo Editing Extension
: You can now use your favorite filters right inside the Apple Photos app.
- Supports ‘All Photos’ album
: You can load all of your photos in iOS 8

We'll always do our best to listen to your feedback and give you a better product!

Follow us on Instagram: @MoldivApp
